long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Derp Learning, replaces the phrase 'deep learning' with 'derp learning'. With 'derp learning' the future of AI is here. For more explanation check out Jupiter Broadcasting and the Linux Action Show episode 418.
